snippet: A coming book by Janette Sadik-Khan will offer action plans for transportation planners and activists, based on her work in the Bloomberg administrations.
abstract: Book Streetfight: Rewriting the Operating Code for Cities by Janette Sadik-Khan, transportation commissioner for former New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, offers action plans for transportation planners and activists across the country who are looking to transform their cities and neighborhoods.
lead_paragraph: A coming book by Janette Sadik-Khan will offer action plans for transportation planners and activists, based on her work in the Bloomberg administrations.

headline.main: Ex-Transportation Chief Is Putting Her ‘Streetfight’ in Print
headline.print_headline: Ex-Transportation Chief Is Putting Her ‘Streetfight’ in Print
